attributes.comment:
I am against an increase in cost for the Immigration Benefit Application/Petition
and Biometric Fee Schedule. I cannot see how an increase of 60% is necessary
when we just had an increase in 2005 of 40%. Cost of living has increased
approximatly 3% per year that being said an increase of 6% at most should be
sufficient, although at this point I think that is even too much. I am sure there are
other areas that can be down sized, maybe an outside source could come in and
give suggestions on appropriate areas for downsizing. You could have better info
on internet so people do not have to talk to a representative which i am sure is
costly. The frequently asked question section does not have enough answers, so
unfortunately you have to talk to a live person. I am against the increase
proposed and hope you take my opinion into account before deciding to this
increase.
Thank you a concerned citizen.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Dawn
